name: Blade
aliases: Daywalker, Frank Blade, SwitchBlade, Spider Hero, Ronin
powersText:
Master martial artist
Skilled swordsman, street fighter and marksman
Highly knowledgeable about vampire lore
Superhuman strength, speed, agility and stamina
Enhanced senses
Accelerated healing factor
Immunity to the bites of vampires and vampire hypnosis
Slowed aging
Use of throwing knives
Ability to sense supernatural creatures
